properties.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 3:02PM MST until January 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20
inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph.

* WHERE...Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet.

* WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening
commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON
